summary: The diff implements all four requirements from the BuildRequest. TanStack Router configuration was added for /admin route (REQ-1), AdminDashboard component displays booking table with all required columns (REQ-2), status toggle functionality was implemented via dropdown menu and backend methods (REQ-3), and comprehensive error handling with loading states and error messages was added (REQ-4). No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.

hallucinated_features.description: Auto-refresh functionality for bookings every 30 seconds
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not specify automatic polling or refresh intervals for booking data. This is an enhancement beyond requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Manual refresh button in admin dashboard header
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request a manual refresh button. Only data fetching and error handling were specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Summary statistics showing pending/completed booking counts
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request summary statistics or count displays, only the table with bookings and status toggle.

hallucinated_features.description: Toast notifications for status update success/failure
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specified error messages for data load failures but did not request toast notifications for status update operations.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend toggleBookingStatus method that automatically flips status
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specified status toggle functionality but did not prescribe the specific backend implementation method. The updateBookingStatus method would suffice.
